english.segment1: A life you built exploiting the dreams of innocents. Preying on the wide-eyed fantasies of those with the purest intent. As parasites, they always need a host (how many lives have you bled?). Your crooked gain will always find a leechs ending
english.segment2: There is a reason you cannot sleep. You found the wages youve sown in greed. There is no solace in what you seek. You found that although you have gained it all you had to sacrifice..
english.segment4: After all was said and done you lost..
english.segment6: Rest it eludes you as spirits fill your head. Longing for the days when ghosts you used wont follow you into your bed. So now its cost the apple of your eyes (youll never use her again). Why cant you see that she is not your property when..
english.segment7: How many lives have you bled?
english.segment8: After all was said and done, you lost..
